name: Fiabawls
author: Jadehex - Farm Expert
notes:
Cosmic is a good card rn, Im a good player, i chose a random deck that likes using cosmic. Laquari tech specifically so i can have it in my opening hand in the glad mu. The decks ok but the ladder has so many random decks that its better to play something that roughly 50%s all of its matchups.
I was meaning to put a random extra deck for when i opened laq but eh already kog
